docs.title: Welcome to the IASI Code Collection!
docs.text: The IASI Code Collection enables data processing and analysis for remote sensing observations captured Eumetsat's Infrared Atmospheric Sounding Interferometer (IASI).

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
We are interested in sharing the AIRS Code Collection for research applications. Please do not hesitate to contact us, if you have any questions or need support.

Dr. Lars Hoffmann, l.hoffmann@fz-juelich.de

Jülich Supercomputing Centre, Forschungszentrum Jülich
